articles.description: The verdict is announced in Manchester City's legal case against the Premier League's associated party transaction rules.
articles.title: Manchester City: Verdict reached in Premier League APT legal case

articles.description: England toiled on the opening day of the first Test but they, and stand-in skipper, Ollie Pope did just fine, says chief cricket writer Stephan Shemilt.
articles.title: Pakistan vs England: Tourists and Ollie Pope do just fine on opening day of first Test in Multan

articles.description: Danni Wyatt-Hodge and Nat Sciver-Brunt guide England to an impressive seven-wicket win over South Africa at the Women's T20 World Cup.
articles.title: Women's T20 World Cup: England beat South Africa by seven wickets for crucial victory

articles.description: England trio Morgan Gibbs-White, Ezri Konsa and Kobbie Mainoo are ruled out of England's Nations League games in October.
articles.title: England squad: Morgan Gibbs-White, Ezri Konsa and Kobbie Mainoo ruled out

articles.description: Tyrrell Hatton's victory at last week's Dunhill Links Championship provides pause for thought about how Europe’s leading tour might approach an uncertain future, writes Iain Carter.
articles.title: How Tyrrell Hatton's Dunhill Links win may help end PGA Tour, DP World Tour and LIV paralysis

articles.description: Netherlands legend Johan Neeskens dies at the age of 73, the Dutch football federation confirms.
articles.title: Former Netherlands midfielder Neeskens dies aged 73

articles.description: Manchester United consider replacing Erik ten Hag with Ruud van Nistelrooy - or Thomas Tuchel - or maybe keeping him. Read today's gossip column.
articles.title: Football gossip: Erik ten Hag, Ruud van Nistelrooy, Thomas Tuchel, Leroy Sane

articles.description: They were 100-1 Super Bowl outsiders before the season but the Minnesota Vikings have quickly become the NFL's feel-good story after starting the season unbeaten.
articles.title: Minnesota Vikings unbeaten: How they became NFL's feel-good story

articles.description: Imogen Grant, Rhydian Cowley and Adrian 'Ace' Buchan are among the winners of this year's BBC Green Sport Awards.
articles.title: BBC Green Sport Awards 2024: Winners revealed

articles.description: Jurickson Profar of the San Diego Padres is targeted by LA Dodgers fans who throw baseballs and beer at him during a heated game two of the National League Division Series.
articles.title: LA Dodgers-San Diego Padres game delayed as fans throw baseballs and beer at Jurickson Profar
